name: Family Virus: Recoded
description:
KEYBOARD/ MOUSE

 Swap Unlocked Characters

1- Brother

2- Sister

3- Mom

4- Dad

MOVEMENT

W- Up

A- Left

S- Down

D- Right

Mouse Move- Camera Aim

COMBAT

LMB- Shoot

DIALOGUE

LMB- To Continue

PAUSE MENU

Esc- Opens Menu

CONTROLLER

 Swap Unlocked Characters

Dpad:

Up- Brother

Right- Sister

Down- Mother

Right- Father

MOVEMENT

Left Thumb Stick:

UP- Up

LEFT- Left

DOWN- Down

RIGHT- Right

Right Thumb Stick- Camera Aim

COMBAT

R Trigger- Shoot

 DIALOGUE

LMB- To Continue

PAUSE MENU

START- Opens Menu
